title: The journal of Sir Walter Scott,
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: The Magnum has taken extremely in Ireland, which was little counted on, and elsewhere. Hence he proposes a new edition of Tales of my Grandfather, First Series ; also an enlargement of the Third Series.
